thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's RBL Bank Dec-Qtr Net Profit Rises About 28 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's RBL Bank Dec-Qtr Net Profit Rises About 28 Pct
text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - RBL Bank Ltd:
* DEC-QUARTER NET PROFIT 1.65 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.29 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC-QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 11.51 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 9.61 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC-QUARTER PROVISIONS 823.1 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 361.7 MILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC-QUARTER GROSS NPA 1.56 PERCENT VERSUS 1.44 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC-QUARTER NET NPA 0.97 PERCENT VERSUS 0.78 PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC-QUARTER NET INTEREST MARGIN 3.89 PERCENT Source text: bit.ly/2rswrhK Further company coverage:
